data.text: @sainik636 @abhihiremath94 @vka27 Hey Vijay, just a bit busy in developing the perfect platform for financial experts & advisors :). Would love to take you & Abhishek through the demo.

Hope you don't give the same treatment to poor Abhishek 😷
